name: CDS
description: County/District/School code

name: RTYPE
description:
Record Type: (D=District, S=School, 


X=State)

name: STYPE
description: Type: 1=Unified, 2=Elementary District, 3=9-12 High District, 4=7-12 High District, E=Elementary School, M=Middle School, H=High School

name: SPED
description:
A=Alternative Schools Accountability Model

(ASAM), E=Special Education, and C=Combination ASAM and Special Education, S=State Special Schools

name: SIZE
description: S=Small (11-99 Valid Scores), T=Under 11 Valid Scores

name: CHARTER
description: Y=Charter, Not Direct Funded, D=Direct Funded Charter, Blank=Not a Charter School

name: SNAME
description: School Name

name: DNAME
description: District Name

name: CNAME
description: County Name

name: FLAG
description: Flag Values

name: VALID
description: Number of Students Included in the 2007 Academic Performance Index (API)

name: API07B
description: 2007 API (Base)

name: ST_RANK
description:
Statewide Rank (I=Invalid data, B=District or ASAM, 


C=Special Education School

. Note: Should have asterisk if Valid_Num < 100)

name: SIM_RANK
description:
Similar Schools Rank  (I=Invalid data, B= District or ASAM,


C=Special Education School, O=Schools with SCI changed because of data change, but similar school ranks not changed, 
  

  S - Schools whose SCI changed and their Similar School Ranks also changed. Blank=the school did not have an SCI score with p3 data or the school did not have SCI score change with updated data.)

name: GR_TARG
description:
2007–08 API Growth Target (A=means the school or subgroup scored at or above the statewide performance target of 800 in 2007, 


B=means this is either an LEA or an Alternative Schools Accountability Model (ASAM) school, 


C=means this is a special education school.)

name: API_TARG
description:
2008 API Target (A=means the school or subgroup scored at or above the statewide performance target of 800 in 2007, 


B= means this is either an LEA or an Alternative Schools Accountability Model (ASAM) school, 


C=means this is a special education school.)
